titleStmt.title: The orders, rules, and ordinances ordained, devised, and made by the master and keepers or wardens and comminalty of the mystery or art of Stationers of the city of London, for the well governing of that society
titleStmt.author: Stationers' Company (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Signed: "H. Finch, C. Ri. Rainsford, Fra. North."
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
